cloud_pbx.title: CLOUD PBX SOLUTION
cloud_pbx.description: Virtual PBX is no longer a unfamiliar term in the era of Industry 4.0, with technologies such as VoIP, AI, Big Data, IoT, etc., contributing to advancing the voice sector in general and customer service in particular. It helps reduce deployment costs and call expenses by over 80%, while significantly minimizing customer service time. A virtual PBX is a telephone service that uses the internet over an IP network instead of traditional phone lines. What’s particularly special is that the cloud-based virtual PBX operates on a cloud platform, with connections made via IP (network address), making installation straightforward—just requiring an internet connection and devices like IP Phones, computers or laptops (calls can be made via a website or softphone app), or smartphones (with an installed app). As long as there’s internet access, the PBX can be accessed anytime, anywhere.
features: Operates over the internet
Supports a large number of users with flexible scalability
Integrates multiple numbers: 1900, 1800, fixed-line, mobile
Greeting message (with interactive IVR support)
Default hold music
Custom hold music for VIP customers
Set password (PIN) for outgoing calls
Time-based outbound call routing
Transfer (call forwarding)
Call pickup
Call forward: Used when unable to answer directly, outside working hours, or during holidays. The system uses a mobile or fixed SIP number to forward calls to a designated number.
Free internal calls between users, departments, and branches
Block disruptive calls (blacklist)
Limit call directions (internal, local, inter-provincial, mobile, international, etc.)
Group ringing (Ringgroup), Queues
Time-based call routing
VIP customer call routing (can transfer calls from these customers directly to the responsible person without waiting)
Connects multiple offices, branches, and store chains
Voicemail (leave a message after the beep)
Audio conference (audio meeting room function)
Call recording (incoming, outgoing, internal)
Recording duration (committed for 3 months - expandable based on customer needs)
Web-based call management account
Supports search by phone number, line number, call time (incoming/outgoing)
Listen to recorded files directly from the web browser
benefits: No need to invest in or operate the PBX system.
The entire PBX system is professionally managed by Viettel with high security.
Easy extension expansion.
Quick deployment, saving time.
Low cost, extremely economical call rates.
No geographical limitations.
High and stable call quality.
No limit on the number of calls.
Easy capacity expansion.
Connect calls from anywhere using smartphones or tablets.
No complex configuration required, fast deployment time.

leased_line.title: Leased Line
leased_line.description: The Leased Line service provides a dedicated physical connection for customers using fiber optic cables to transmit information between fixed points within the country via a point-to-point connection method. Customers will not share bandwidth at any time.

Connection infrastructure: Leased Line service deployed on SDH infrastructure
advantage: CUSTOMIZABLE TO NEEDS: Customers can lease channels with speeds starting as low as 64Kb/s up to unlimited, with standard network interfaces.
FAST SUPPORT AND ISSUE RESOLUTION: Incident response time <0.5h, resolution time 2h-6h, 24/7/365 support.

BEST QUALITY: With a nationwide fiber optic network covering all districts and a high redundancy structure, customers using domestic or international leased lines are assured the best quality and redundancy levels.

HIGHEST STABILITY: Deployed on a modern international telecommunications network with the highest level of redundancy. Service availability reaches 99.99%, with a committed error rate of less than 10⁻⁴%.

It meets the needs for high-speed, secure data transmission (data, voice, video, etc.) between two or more customer branch locations.
features: IP PLANNING: IP can be planned by the customer or Viettel
Point-to-multipoint connection
Point-to-point connection
Multipoint-to-multipoint connection
Fullmesh connection
Suitable for customers capable of managing internal network systems (e.g., banks, government agencies, IT companies).
advantage: COST SAVINGS: The MetroWan service helps customers establish a private network at a low cost by creating virtual connections. All locations can connect directly with just one physical connection per site.

HIGH SECURITY: Connections between sites are encrypted, labeled, and established with private tunnels on Viettel’s core network system.

e1.title: DIGITAL TRUNK SERVICE (E1)
e1.description: The Digital Trunk (E1) service provides a transmission link between the telecom provider’s PBX and the customer’s internal PBX. Each trunk allows up to 30 simultaneous calls.
advantage: INFRASTRUCTURE: Deployed on fiber optic infrastructure
BANDWIDTH: Each E1 trunk has a 2Mbps bandwidth
PHONE NUMBERS: No limit on the number of phone numbers activated on one E1 trunk
VOICE CHANNELS: Supports 30 simultaneous voice channels, each at 64 kbps (2048 kbps = 32 x 64 kbps) with 2 signaling channels.
DEPLOYMENT: Deployment condition: The customer’s PBX must have an E1 interface port and use SS7 or R2 signaling.
benefits: HIGH QUALITY: The E1 digital trunk establishes a direct transmission channel from the provider’s central switching PBX to the customer’s PABX, bypassing intermediate PBXs, ensuring high call quality and better information security compared to regular phones.
STABLE SIGNAL: Deployed via fiber optic cables, it’s unaffected by external environmental factors, ensuring stable voice signals.
COST OPTIMIZATION: Using an E1 digital trunk offers significantly lower rates than regular PSTN services.
GREATER FLEXIBILITY: Easily expands the business’s phone system with a single input signal and supports unlimited subscriber extensions.

hybrid_cloud.title: HYBRID CLOUD
hybrid_cloud.description: Hybrid Cloud is a cloud computing model combining Private Cloud and Public Cloud. Hybrid Cloud meets the needs for data transfer between Private and Public Clouds when there are changes in cost, computing, or security requirements. Additionally, Hybrid Cloud offers greater flexibility and more deployment options compared to traditional Private or Public Cloud models.
advantage: PROACTIVE CONTROL: Businesses can use Private Cloud for specific, highly sensitive tasks or those requiring low latency.
HIGH FLEXIBILITY: Businesses can leverage additional resources from Public Cloud when needed.
COST OPTIMIZATION: With unlimited scalability from Public Cloud infrastructure, businesses only pay for additional computing capacity when used.
EASY TRANSITION: Businesses can gradually transfer tasks to the cloud environment in small parts, requiring minimal effort. This reduces workload over time.
benefits: DIVERSE USAGE PURPOSES: Hybrid cloud technology allows businesses to combine Private Cloud for storing highly secure data and Public Cloud for less critical, experimental resources.
HIGH FLEXIBILITY: Flexibly responds to task deployment with high variability or sudden changes.

cloud_storage.title: ONLINE STORAGE SYSTEM (CLOUD STORAGE)
cloud_storage.description: Cloud Storage is an object-oriented storage system with a simple web service interface, storing and retrieving data from anywhere over the internet.
advantage: SIMPLE CONNECTION: Access the system via S3, HTTP/HTTPS/API connections, allowing users to develop applications simply and quickly.
UNLIMITED CAPACITY: Expand storage up to Petabytes as needed without service interruption or configuration changes. The larger the storage, the cheaper the rental cost.
MAXIMUM SPEED: No transmission speed limits, minimizing data download time. Maximizes customer endpoint bandwidth without concerns about undersea cable issues.
COST SAVINGS: Saves costs on system investment and upgrades, equipment maintenance, avoids resource waste, and eliminates post-sale support costs.

cloud_server.title: VIRTUAL SERVER SERVICE (CLOUD SERVER)
cloud_server.description: Provides servers on a cloud computing platform. Each virtual server is a standalone system, operating independently like a physical server. Users have full control to adjust the system, such as installing software, selecting operating systems, and using internal system functions.
features: POWERFUL CONFIGURATION
SUPER-FAST DEPLOYMENT
OPTIMAL SECURITY
FLEXIBLE SCALABILITY
EASY MANAGEMENT
DATA SAFETY
benefits: INDEPENDENCE AND FLEXIBILITY
CONTINUOUS BACKUP
RAPID SCALABILITY
COST OPTIMIZATION
SIMPLE MANAGEMENT
SECURITY AND SAFETY

public_cloud.title: PUBLIC CLOUD
public_cloud.description: Viettel’s Public Cloud service uses cloud computing technology to create IT resources like virtual machines, applications, and storage—always available to users via an internet connection. Public Cloud is an advanced solution replacing traditional IT infrastructure architecture.
advantage: QUICK DEPLOYMENT: Public Cloud enables rapid deployment of infrastructure services with just a few simple steps. What used to take weeks can now be done in minutes.
ACCESS FROM ANYWHERE: Storing data on Public Cloud allows users to access it from anywhere, anytime via the internet.
BACKUP AND DATA RECOVERY: With Public Cloud, data backup and recovery are much faster than with physical infrastructure, thanks to cloud computing characteristics and Viettel’s vast infrastructure.
REDUCED INFRASTRUCTURE RISKS AND ERRORS: The provider manages, updates, and maintains hardware infrastructure, ensuring service continuity.
RESOURCE SCALING ON DEMAND: Public Cloud can automatically scale resources up or down flexibly according to user needs.
benefits: REDUCED INVESTMENT AND MAINTENANCE COSTS: Eliminates initial investment costs and enables rapid resource deployment; businesses only pay for used services. Personnel for managing and maintaining infrastructure is minimized.
ENSURED CONNECTIVITY AND RESOURCE UTILIZATION: Connects, shares data, and collaborates anytime, anywhere via the internet.
GUARANTEED SERVICE QUALITY WITH 99.99% UPTIME SLA: Complies with international security and safety standards with 24/7/365 support.

READY ADAPTABILITY: Public Cloud offers high flexibility with scalable and customizable mechanisms based on actual usage needs, including an 'ON/OFF' service feature for maximum adaptability and cost savings.
BUSINESS COMPETITIVENESS: Businesses save costs and time managing IT infrastructure.

private_cloud.title: PRIVATE CLOUD
private_cloud.description: Viettel’s Private Cloud service is developed on OpenStack and VMware open-source platforms. Private Cloud provides a dedicated virtual server system for each organization or business, ensuring secure, independent resources and optimized system management. It can be deployed on the customer’s IT infrastructure or at Viettel’s data centers.
advantage: FAST SETUP, EASY UPGRADES: Creating virtual servers, dividing resources, and automatically allocating them to users based on actual needs saves businesses operational time, minimizing excess resources and optimizing the system. Automated tools accelerate infrastructure service upgrades and expansion with just a few simple steps, reducing what once took weeks to minutes.
FLEXIBLE SCALABILITY: Scale-out or scale-in features adjust resources instantly based on application demands, quickly responding to services and saving businesses costs, time, and manpower.

HIGH AVAILABILITY: The system operates stably with high recovery capabilities thanks to pre-established redundancy plans and automatic replacements when failures occur, ensuring safety and 24/7 availability.
benefits: SIMPLE SYSTEM OPERATION: System operation is simplified with automated management tools integrating multiple features for admin self-operation.

HIGH AVAILABILITY: The solution enhances system availability and recovery, ensuring continuous business operations without infrastructure interruptions. Viettel’s large-scale, separate hardware infrastructure is always ready for any business expansion needs.
MAXIMUM MANAGEMENT CONTROL: Private Cloud is accessible only to the using business, which can configure, manage, and allocate server resources flexibly according to needs.

cloud_pc.title: VIRTUAL PC SERVICE (CLOUD PC)
cloud_pc.description: The Virtual PC (Cloud PC) service is a hardware and application virtualization solution researched and developed by Viettel IDC. Cloud PC provides a flexible working environment, processing data and applications on a cloud computing platform, completely replacing traditional PC processing.
features: SAFE AND SECURE INFORMATION: Centralized storage reduces data loss risks. Integrated security system with Antivirus.
QUICK PROVISIONING, FLEXIBLE SCALING: Rapid service provisioning based on templates, flexible upgrades as needed
CENTRALIZED MANAGEMENT: Centralized management and monitoring, minimizing operational costs
COST OPTIMIZATION: Reduces PC investment and operational costs. Decreases staffing and power consumption
MULTI-PLATFORM: Usable anytime, anywhere, on any device: Supports multi-platform access: Clients, laptops, smartphones, tablets, etc.

dedicated_server.title: SERVER RENTAL SERVICE (DEDICATED SERVER)
dedicated_server.description: The Dedicated Server rental service provides equipment rental, including server hardware, network devices, firewalls, network security devices, storage devices, etc. Customers are advised to choose suitable servers and have full usage and management rights over rented equipment via smart management tools.
benefits: COST SAVINGS: Renting space saves businesses costs on initial equipment and infrastructure investment, power consumption, maintenance, and operation.
CONFIGURATION OPTIONS: Choose configurations from globally trusted providers: HP, DELL, IBM, etc.
INDEPENDENCE AND SECURITY: Renting a server gives you full usage and management rights over your server.
SMART MANAGEMENT: Remote device management with specialized tools
HIGH FLEXIBILITY: Ability to expand resources, upgrade space, and meet equipment needs anytime.

backup_service.title: DATA BACKUP SERVICE (BACKUP AS A SERVICE)
backup_service.description: Data Backup (Backup as a Service) is a service that backs up data per customer requirements, stored on a cloud computing infrastructure.
features: BACKUP ALL DATA TYPES: Backs up all data types: Files, databases, operating systems, virtual machines, physical machines to Viettel’s cloud storage infrastructure.
AUTOMATED SCHEDULING: Automatically backs up hourly, daily, weekly, monthly, yearly. Supports rotating schedules and fixed-time backups.
AUTOMATED NOTIFICATIONS: The system automatically emails administrators when backups succeed or fail.
DISASTER RECOVERY: Data is backed up to Viettel IDC’s Cloud system, ensuring safety even if the primary system faces disasters.
VERSION STORAGE: The system stores multiple versions (recovery points) of data, ensuring safety even if data is corrupted by viruses.
DATA ENCRYPTION: Data is end-to-end encrypted with the latest standard (AES 256) and SSL transmission encryption, ensuring information security.

cdn.title: CONTENT DELIVERY NETWORK (CDN)
cdn.description: Content Delivery Network (CDN) is a system of multiple servers distributed across various geographical locations, tasked with copying and storing website content so users accessing the website can load content from the nearest CDN server.
features: LIVE STREAMING: The Live Streaming feature delivers channels and events live to a large number of users.
VOD STREAMING: The VOD Streaming feature delivers videos to users’ end devices.
WEB CACHING: Speeds up websites by temporarily storing (caching) web data on the CDN system.
HTTP DOWNLOAD: Accelerates file downloads by temporarily storing (caching) content files on the CDN system
advantage: INCREASED AVAILABILITY: Website content is stored in multiple copies across many servers, ensuring service to users even if some servers fail.
IMPROVED RESPONSE SPEED: Multiple CDN servers serving customers minimize request wait times, providing the fastest service.
REDUCED LATENCY: Users accessing websites are served by the nearest content-hosting server, minimizing load wait times.
COST SAVINGS: Saves initial investment costs for server systems and streaming technology. Optimizes operational costs.

domain.title: DOMAIN SERVICE (DOMAIN)
domain.description: The Domain service provides an internet identifier for websites. Domains are typically tied to a company’s name and brand. Domains are unique and prioritized for the first registrant.
features: QUICK SETUP: Professional domains with diverse extensions based on usage purposes and customer needs
SMART MANAGEMENT: No geographical or time restrictions, accessible anytime, anywhere.
OWNERSHIP ASSURANCE: Ensures the domain is unique, official, and exclusively owned by the registrant
benefits: EXCLUSIVE OWNERSHIP: Exclusive ownership for businesses and individuals of an official, unique website identifier
BRAND AND TRADEMARK AFFIRMATION: Affirms brand and product trademarks through an official, protected domain website
EXPANDED CUSTOMER REACH: Expands customer reach across all regions and age groups
ENHANCED CREDIBILITY: Enhances credibility and brand coverage
CUSTOMER ATTRACTION: Attracts customers on an unlimited scale

colocation.title: EQUIPMENT SPACE RENTAL SERVICE (COLOCATION)
colocation.description: The Equipment Space Rental (Colocation) service provides infrastructure space, power systems, air conditioning, and related equipment for deploying IT systems, allowing customers full usage and control without needing to invest in installation or maintenance.
features: REMOTE MONITORING: IP camera remote monitoring
SERVER CONTROL: Remote server control via IP KVM
TRAFFIC AND BANDWIDTH MONITORING: Monitors traffic and bandwidth via MRTG
ALERTS: System alerts via SMS
REMOTE SUPPORT: Remote support via 24/7 portal
SECURITY: Magnetic card and fingerprint security
SUPPORT SYSTEMS: Air conditioning, UPS, backup generators, lightning protection, and fire prevention systems
advantage: IDEAL INFRASTRUCTURE: Data centers meet Rated 3 - TIA942 standards, optimized supporting infrastructure... providing ideal conditions for equipment
STABLE CONNECTIVITY: Provides fast, stable, continuous internet with large bandwidth, ensuring seamless operation
FLEXIBLE EXPANSION: Expands resources and upgrades space as needed. Viettel IDC’s infrastructure is always ready for this.
MULTI-LAYER SECURITY: Your servers are controlled by a camera monitoring system, fingerprint security, and remote tracking via IP Camera
COST OPTIMIZATION: Instead of massive investments in data center infrastructure, you can rent and experience it—simpler and far more cost-effective.
FREE SUPPORT: A highly skilled IT team is always available 24/7 to monitor, answer questions, and resolve any issues.
benefits: COST SAVINGS: Reduces costs for businesses.
LONGEVITY: Increases equipment lifespan.
REDUCED INCIDENTS: Minimizes incidents.
SMART MANAGEMENT: A solution for business information management.
SYSTEM SECURITY: Secured with professional Firewall, Anti-Virus, and Anti-Spam systems.
HIGH STABILITY: 24/7/365 support.

IPLC.title: International Private Leased Circuit (IPLC)
IPLC.description: IPLC is a service suitable for organizations, businesses, and international corporations seeking fast, secure, and high-quality connectivity between headquarters and branches. It provides a reliable solution for entities requiring dedicated, high-performance transmission lines across multiple locations.
features: Based on synchronous SDH/DWDM optical infrastructure supporting multiple connection interfaces: V.35, E1, Ethernet, and optical interfaces STM-1, STM-4.
Offers a wide range of transmission speeds from low to high: nx64Kbps, E1, nx2Mbps, 45M to 10G (STM-64).
Supports all essential customer applications: voice, fax, video conferencing, and data transmission.
advantage: Service uptime commitment: 99.9%.
Channel delivery within 4-10 weeks (depending on overseas location).
Guaranteed 24/7 transmission monitoring and troubleshooting support.
benefits: Dedicated high-speed connectivity channel.
Flexible and secure network connection model.
Highly reliable and protected multi-connection infrastructure.

MPLS.title: International IP Private Leased Circuit (MPLS)
MPLS.description: Viettel’s International IP Private Leased Circuit (MPLS) service is a high-speed international data transmission solution designed with diverse connection models (point-to-point, point-to-multipoint, multipoint-to-multipoint) to meet the needs of customers establishing a private network between offices worldwide. It is ideal for corporations, conglomerates, and foreign companies requiring fast, reliable, and secure connections to multiple global locations.
features: MPLS network infrastructure with Ethernet connection interfaces.
Flexible connection speeds: nx64Kbps, 1-100 Mbps, 1G, 10G, etc.
Supports all IP-based applications such as VoIP, video conferencing, and Internet.
advantage: Service uptime commitment: 99.85%.
Service delivery within 4-10 weeks (depending on overseas location).
Guaranteed 24/7 transmission monitoring and troubleshooting support.
benefits: Flexible, secure, and highly reliable connectivity.
Easy connection setup.
Cost-effective pricing.
Priority support for quality based on service groups.

ipTransit.title: IP Transit
ipTransit.description: IP Transit is a service providing large-scale data transmission from a customer’s domestic infrastructure through international gateways or the Internet infrastructure of the service provider. As a leading provider in Vietnam, Viettel ensures top-tier IP Transit services with a commitment to the highest quality and competitive pricing. Targeting the high bandwidth demands and rapid growth of Internet Service Providers (ISPs), Mobile Operators (MOs), and Content Delivery Networks (CDNs), Viettel offers an IP Transit package with global Internet connectivity focused on performance and efficiency.
features: Supports 10G peering connections with individual carriers at geographically distributed POPs in Hong Kong, Singapore, the USA, and Europe.
Supports multiple connection interfaces: FE, GE, 10GE, 100GE.
Supports both IP protocols: IPv4 and IPv6.
advantage: Service uptime commitment: 99.99%.
Service delivery within 4-10 weeks (depending on overseas location).
Guaranteed 24/7 transmission monitoring and troubleshooting support.
benefits: High resilience with a diverse redundant network structure – all core network nodes connected by multiple 10G links.
Scalable bandwidth and port connectivity based on demand.
Direct network connections with all global Tier 1 providers via Viettel’s AS7552.

items.title: Vietnam’s Largest Submarine Fiber Optic Cable Begins Operation
items.description: ADC (Asia Direct Cable), stretching nearly 10,000 km, runs along the Singapore - Hong Kong - Japan route, connecting three of Asia’s largest data centers. The cable features an 8-fiber pair (8FP) configuration, utilizing high-density wavelength division multiplexing technology with an initial total capacity of over 160 Tbps.

items.title: Viettel’s 5G Network Surpasses 5.5 Million Users
items.description: On February 28, Viettel Telecom announced reaching 5.5 million 5G users as of early February. The network reported that users are distributed across all 63 provinces, with the majority concentrated in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City, totaling 2.4 million, accounting for over 40% of the national user base. The remaining top five locations include Da Nang, Binh Duong, and Can Tho.

items.title: Vingroup Partners with Viettel
items.description: Vingroup Corporation and the Military Industry and Telecommunications Group (Viettel) signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) on February 18 in Hanoi. The collaboration between these two leading Vietnamese conglomerates aims to build an innovative ecosystem for national sustainable development, elevating the position of Vietnamese businesses on the global stage.

items.title: 1,000 AI and Semiconductor Experts and Businesses to Visit Vietnam
items.description: At a press conference announcing the 2025 International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Semiconductors (AISC 2025) held on the afternoon of February 24 in Hanoi, Deputy Minister of Planning and Investment Nguyen Duc Tam stated: The conference will be co-chaired by Eric Schmidt, former CEO of Google, and will bring together approximately 1,000 globally influential experts, scientists, and businesses in the fields of AI and semiconductors. It aims to promote cooperation, knowledge exchange, and guide technological development in Vietnam and the region, Mr. Tam said.

items.title: ChatGPT Company Attracts 400 Million Weekly Users
items.description: An OpenAI spokesperson told Reuters that the company’s weekly user base has grown by 100 million, from 300 million at the end of 2024. Among them, paid enterprise users surpassed 2 million in February, doubling from September 2024. The reason is that many employees used ChatGPT personally and later recommended its deployment to their companies.
